patient_info: Urinary urgency,Urinary retention,Urinary hesitancy,Urinary incontinence,Episodic hypertension,Hepatic steatosis,Constipation,Bradykinesia,Abnormal basal ganglia morphology,Akinesia,Clumsiness,Action tremor,Sleep disturbance,Shuffling gait,Falls,EMG abnormality,Decreased body weight,Abnormal left ventricular function,Poor fine motor coordination,Progressive language deterioration,Foot dorsiflexor weakness,Paroxysmal vertigo,Aortic atherosclerotic lesion,Pain,Abnormal urine cytology,Abasia,Abnormal lateral ventricle morphology,Hand muscle weakness,Reduced blood folate concentration,Pollakisuria,Dysuria
golden_diagnosis: 多系统萎缩/Multiple system atrophy; MSA/Multiple system atrophy/Multiple system atrophy 1, susceptibility to,Multiple system atrophy, parkinsonian type,多系统萎缩/Multiple system atrophy; MSA/Multiple system atrophy/Multiple system atrophy 1, susceptibility to,Multiple system atrophy, cerebellar type,多系统萎缩/Multiple system atrophy; MSA/Multiple system atrophy/Multiple system atrophy 1, susceptibility to
predict_diagnosis:
1. Multiple system atrophy (MSA)
2. Parkinson's disease with urinary dysfunction
3. Amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS) with urinary involvement
4. Spinocerebellar ataxia (SCA) type 2 or 3
5. Frontotemporal dementia (FTD) with urinary symptoms
6. Progressive supranuclear palsy (PSP)
7. Corticobasal degeneration (CBD)
8. vascular parkinsonism
9. Idiopathic Parkinson's disease (IPD) with urinary complications
10. Overlap syndrome between Parkinson's disease and multiple system atrophy
